name: TCT-Dynamic-Spreadsheet-Counter-for-Divi
author: Taylor Drayson

sections.description: This plugin allows you to take data from a specific cell in any sheet of your spreadsheet and display it in real-time on your website using the number or circle counter module in Divi.
sections.installation:
To install:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
2. Activate the plugin through the \’Plugins\’ screen in WordPress
3. Use the Settings->Sheets Divi Counter screen to configure the plugin
4. Add your API key for your Google Sheet to the API Key text box
5. Add your Sheet ID for your Google Sheet to the Sheet ID text box
6. Add the shortcode to your page using the Divi Code Module

short_description: Display google sheets data in the Divi Number Module
description: This plugin allows you to take data from a specific cell in any sheet of your spreadsheet and display it in real-time on your website using the number or circle counter module in Divi.

screenshots.caption: Example of shortcode output on the frontend
